catalog_metadata.name: ICP cluster v320 on IBM Cloud
catalog_metadata.description: Deploys ICP 3.2.0 cluster on IBM Cloud, loads the MCM docker images and deploys the MCM Klusterlet
catalog_metadata.longDescription: Deploys ICP 3.2.0 cluster on IBM Cloud, loads the MCM docker images and deploys the MCM Klusterlet to make this a managed cluster.
catalog_metadata.author: admin

tags.name: Request_Group
tags.label: Request_Group
tags.description: The current context group id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template. This is important because a user may be part of more than one group and this identifies the context of which group the user made the request.

tags.name: Request_User
tags.label: Request_User
tags.description: The user id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template.

tags.name: Service_Name
tags.label: Service_Name
tags.description: Name provided for the service instance by the end user at time of request

tags.name: Service_Identifier
tags.label: Service_Identifier
tags.description: Unique identifer generated by ICAM which is mapped to the service instance of the template provisioned.

actions.name: Provision
actions.description: Default action for deployment of service

input_parameters.name: private_key
input_parameters.label: Private Key (base64 encoded)
input_parameters.description: Private key corresponding to the existing IBM Cloud public key. Used by automation to load the MCM docker images and helm charts on the ICP cluster

input_parameters.name: cloud_connection
input_parameters.label: Cloud Connection
input_parameters.description: IBM Cloud Connection used to deploy the ICP cluster into the IBM Cloud

input_parameters.name: mcm_controller
input_parameters.label: MCM Controller Data Object
input_parameters.description: Data Object pointing to the MCM Hub (Controller)
